name: mfe-v1
description: Micro-frontend architecture with configuration-driven app shell

scripts.build:mfes: pnpm build:shell && pnpm build:header && pnpm build:footer && pnpm build:dashboard-sidebar && pnpm build:dashboard-landing && pnpm build:hotlists-sidebar && pnpm build:hotlists-dashboard
scripts.dev:mfes: concurrently -n shell,header,footer,dash-side,dash-land,hot-side,hot-dash -c blue,cyan,magenta,green,yellow,red,white "pnpm --filter mfe-shell dev" "pnpm --filter common-header dev" "pnpm --filter common-footer dev" "pnpm --filter dashboard-sidebar dev" "pnpm --filter dashboard-landing dev" "pnpm --filter hotlists-sidebar dev" "pnpm --filter hotlists-dashboard dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n config,assets,gateway -c cyan,magenta,green "pnpm start:config" "pnpm start:assets" "pnpm start:gateway"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n config,assets,gateway -c cyan,magenta,green "pnpm dev:config" "pnpm dev:assets" "pnpm dev:gateway"
scripts.dev:dashboard: concurrently -n config,assets,gateway -c cyan,magenta,green "MODE=dashboard pnpm dev:config" "MODE=dashboard pnpm dev:assets" "MODE=dashboard pnpm dev:gateway"
scripts.dev:hotlists: concurrently -n config,assets,gateway -c cyan,magenta,green "MODE=hotlists pnpm dev:config" "MODE=hotlists pnpm dev:assets" "MODE=hotlists pnpm dev:gateway"
